resources.string: Prepare note:\n1.Already installed Whatsapp in phone \n2.Install a backup and restore app ex.(Titanium Backup app) in phone and tablet

1.Backup whatsapp data from your phone by using Titanium Backup 

2.Copy backup these files (com.whatsapp) from phone to your tablet /sdcard/TitaniumBackup/ 

3. Open Titanium Backup and choose whatsapp app to restore 

4.OK, whatsapp inatlled in your tablet successsul!!
